forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 18 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 60. West wind 16 to 25 mph.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco, the atmosphere holds a tranquil allure, with partly cloudy skies painting a soft contrast against the dusk. As the sun dips below the horizon, a gentle wind blows from the west at a robust pace, wrapping the city in a cool embrace. The temperature will settle around a pleasant 50 degrees, inviting warm layers to ward off the evening chill.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, a tapestry of sunshine promises a high around 60 degrees, perfect for a leisurely stroll through Golden Gate Park or an exploration of the vibrant local markets. The persistent winds will continue, carrying the fresh scent of the bay and keeping the air spirited. While scattered patches of fog may retreat toward the ocean, leaving clearer views of the iconic landmarks, the glow of day will make for a lovely backdrop to any outdoor endeavor. Dressing in layers—perhaps a lightweight sweater under a jacket—will ensure comfort as the wind announces its presence. As twilight beckons and the day draws to a close, consider savoring a quiet moment at a local café, soaking in the sounds and sights of this ever-bustling city, where each experience unfolds like a story waiting to be told.
